data.title: Platinum Tour: Miranda Lambert with Justin Moore and Thomas Rhett
data.text:
Get ready for a very special night of country music with a host of performances from some of the biggest young country music stars. Miranda Lambert, Justin Moore & Thomas Rhett will perform live at the Shoreline Amphitheatre on Saturday 9th August. Click on the link below and get your tickets now!

Miranda Leigh Lambert-Shelton is an American country music artist who was a finalist on the 2003 season of Nashville Star, where she finished in third place and later signed to Epic Records. Lambert made her debut with the release of “Me and Charlie Talking”, which was the first single from her 2005 album Kerosene. This album was certified Platinum in the United States. She has released multiple studio albums concreting her status as one of the top country stars.

Justin Moore is a singer song-writer who has released 3 albums the first being his self-titled album Justin Moore, Outlaws Like Me in 2011, and Off the Beaten Path. He has reached the charts 8 times and is growing in popularity as a leading country artist.

Thomas Rhett is a country music newcomer, he featured in jason Aldean’s 2011 song “I Ain’t Ready to Quit” was a huge success and putting Rhett into the spotlight. His debut single, “Something to Do with My Hands”, followed later that year by “Beer with Jesus”. Both of these made Top 30 on the Hot Country Songs charts. His third single, “It Goes Like This”, topped the Country Airplay chart and also peaked at number 2 on the Hot Country Songs.
